name: The Cataclysm
description:
You are a house cat protecting your supply of yarn from rival enemy cats! Don't let them get close enough to take them! All assets were made by us and were made in the 8 by 8 requirement.

Click on the screen in the direction you want your hairball to fire. Clicking fast will only shoot one while having a slower timing will allow for a "shotgun" effect.

Created jointly by Vinadium and Metater.
